summary: One of my favorite things about DnP is the extra things they do for videos. Like when they decorate the office for...
question: One of my favorite things about DnP is the extra things they do for videos. Like when they decorate the office for Christmas/Halloween/Dil's birthday etc. Or how they dress up for Halloween/Christmas videos. Also Phil redecorating his room for the pastel video and how he makes Dan dress up with him for certain videos (japan vs. england school lunches, Will DnP survive austrailia etc). It adds to the atmosphere and I find it cheesy and charming all at once.
answer:
these lads go all fricken out okay like they just try……..so hard and it’s so adorable and appreciated like i hope we’re all out here appreciating it okay this is gonna be a hella long post so deal with it bc they deserve appreciation for their efforts 

first of all we got some stellar background decor and appropriately matching clothing

and then phil making dan dress up

then they just like. do cute lil extra shit like this

look i have so much love for how hard they try okay

tell me why you love dnp

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

summary: Through the Window a Storm is Brewing
title: Through the Window a Storm is Brewing
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2MSMzPD

by an_iridescent_world

On a stormy night in between the European and American legs of the tour Dan realizes just how far he’s come since 2012, and allows himself to cherish the knowledge of everything that has changed for the better since then.

Words: 1515, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M

  • Relationships: Dan Howell/Phil Lester, Dan Howell & Phil Lester

summary: I'm really proud of the phandom
body:
I’m really proud of the phandom

In their latest live stream Dan openly said that he had a crush on the guy who checked if they had drugs on the bus and I’m so so so happy that I’m not seeing any crazy rant about OMG DaN SAiD A GaY ThInG and that nobody is making him feel bad for saying it or shit like that so good job phandom let’s show these men that they can be open without us going mad👏👏👏

blog.description: Thomas - he/him - 17 - I spend way too much time on YouTube watching Dan and Phil and Felix

summary: How can people think that Dan could be jealous about the success of Phil's merch when 1. Dan is literally Phil's number one...
body: How can people think that Dan could be jealous about the success of Phil’s merch when 1. Dan is literally Phil’s number one supporter and he’s always really proud of him and 2. I mean, they have lived together for 8 years and I think by this point they share the money…like, it’s so easy to imagine a scene where Dan is about to go grocery shopping and Phil asks him if he has enough cash or if he needs some. It’s just so much easier to pay rent, bills, taxes and equipment for their channel if they have a common bank account!

reblog.comment: How can people think that Dan could be jealous about the success of Phil’s merch when 1. Dan is literally Phil’s number one supporter and he’s always really proud of him and 2. I mean, they have lived together for 8 years and I think by this point they share the money…like, it’s so easy to imagine a scene where Dan is about to go grocery shopping and Phil asks him if he has enough cash or if he needs some. It’s just so much easier to pay rent, bills, taxes and equipment for their channel if they have a common bank account!

I mean, they have lived together for 8 years and I think by this point they share the money…like, it’s so easy to imagine a scene where Dan is about to go grocery shopping and Phil asks him if he has enough cash or if he needs some. It’s just so much easier to pay rent, bills, taxes and equipment for their channel if they have a common bank account!
trail.content: How can people think that Dan could be jealous about the success of Phil’s merch when 1. Dan is literally Phil’s number one supporter and he’s always really proud of him and 2. I mean, they have lived together for 8 years and I think by this point they share the money…like, it’s so easy to imagine a scene where Dan is about to go grocery shopping and Phil asks him if he has enough cash or if he needs some. It’s just so much easier to pay rent, bills, taxes and equipment for their channel if they have a common bank account!

tags: please reblog if you liked it!
summary: in the darkness, with you - chapter 2: anger
title: in the darkness, with you - chapter 2: anger
body:
Read from the start: https://archiveofourown.org/works/15674688/chapters/36415200

Read chapter 2: https://archiveofourown.org/works/15674688/chapters/36500019

Summary: 
Phil, 28, video editor.
Phil doesn’t believe in love at first sight, and that is not about to change anytime soon. But what about lust? Just two short weeks ago, he’d say no, definitely not.

Not anymore. Not since he first locked eyes with Dan, the new intern at the company he works for. Not since he first thought, “I want him”.

Phil’s wish does come true, but there’s a catch.
It doesn’t mean anything.

Excerpt from chapter 2: 
“You want a drink?”
“You like Crash Bandicoot?”
Dan shoots him a slightly amused glance and responds, “You do know why I asked you here, right?”
Phil swallows down the lump in his throat. “Yeah, but that’s not why I came.”

reblog.comment:
Read from the start: https://archiveofourown.org/works/15674688/chapters/36415200

Read chapter 2: https://archiveofourown.org/works/15674688/chapters/36500019

Phil doesn’t believe in love at first sight, and that is not about to change anytime soon. But what about lust? Just two short weeks ago, he’d say no, definitely not.

Not anymore. Not since he first locked eyes with Dan, the new intern at the company he works for. Not since he first thought, “I want him”.

Dan shoots him a slightly amused glance and responds, “You do know why I asked you here, right?”
Phil swallows down the lump in his throat. “Yeah, but that’s not why I came.”

Read chapter 2: https://archiveofourown.org/works/15674688/chapters/36500019

Summary: 
Phil, 28, video editor.
Phil doesn’t believe in love at first sight, and that is not about to change anytime soon. But what about lust? Just two short weeks ago, he’d say no, definitely not.

Not anymore. Not since he first locked eyes with Dan, the new intern at the company he works for. Not since he first thought, “I want him”.

Phil’s wish does come true, but there’s a catch.
It doesn’t mean anything.

Excerpt from chapter 2: 
“You want a drink?”
“You like Crash Bandicoot?”
Dan shoots him a slightly amused glance and responds, “You do know why I asked you here, right?”
Phil swallows down the lump in his throat. “Yeah, but that’s not why I came.”
